versions.prompt: Create an event scheduling form with: a TextInput for event name, a Textarea for description, a Group with two TextInput components styled as date and time inputs (use type="date" and type="time" HTML attributes), a Select dropdown for event category (Meeting, Workshop, Conference, Social), and a Checkbox for "Send reminder". Include a Submit button. Use Card as container with proper spacing. Use only Mantine core components.

import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, TextInput, Textarea, Group, Select, Checkbox, Button, Stack } from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta = {
  title: 'Generated/Event Scheduling Form',
  id: 'event-scheduling-form-a944aaa4',
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 500 }}>
      <Stack gap="md">
        <TextInput
          label="Event Name"
          placeholder="Enter event name"
          required
        />
        
        <Textarea
          label="Description"
          placeholder="Enter event description"
          minRows={3}
        />
        
        <Group grow>
          <TextInput
            label="Date"
            type="date"
            required
          />
          <TextInput
            label="Time"
            type="time"
            required
          />

        <Select

            { value: 'workshop', label: 'Workshop' },
            { value: 'conference', label: 'Conference' },
            { value: 'social', label: 'Social' },
          ]}
          required
        />
        
        <Checkbox
          label="Send reminder"
        />
        
        <Button fullWidth>
          Submit
        </Button>
      </Stack>
    </Card>
  ),
};
